abstracts.cdata!:
The purpose of the loan is to support
            the reconstruction effort of the Dominican Republic by
            helping to finance imports of raw materials,
            semi-manufactured and final goods necessary to restore
            national production of goods and services. The loan would
            reimburse to the Government of the Dominican Republic
            foreign exchange used to pay for imports of chemical
            products; plastics and rubber; wood and wood products;
            manufactures of stone, gypsum, ceramics and glass; base
            metals and manufactures; machinery and equipment. Imports
            arriving on and after October 1, 1979 would be eligible for reimbursement.
